content:
The University of Nebraska at Omahas athletic department introduced a new mobile experience for students with iPhone and Android devices PERIOD

The OMav Athletics app will allow students to get the latest sports news scores schedules rosters photos live stats ondemand videos and live game audio PERIOD Itll feature the following sports hockey basketball baseball cross country golf soccer softball swimming and diving tennis track and field and volleyball PERIOD

The app is a creative way to engage the student body and get them more excited about attending games PERIOD

The app is available for download now in both the Apple Store and Google Play PERIOD





A post shared by The Gateway thegatewayuno
title: UNO Athletics' new app, OMav now ready for iPhones, iPads - Gateway
name: University of Nebraska, Omaha
